name: Fuck The Police
description:
In the near future, protests in several major cities across the country have taken a turn for the worse. Clashes between activists and authorities turn violent. You have been falsely blamed for the death of Chief of Police. You have been designated Public Enemy No. 1. Fight your way to survival while every cop on the force is trying to hunt you down. You are now enemy of the state!



Main Game Objective:

The main objective of the game is to survive and defend yourself against the police force. Remember, you are on the most wanted list and will be shot on sight. Collect variety of weapons and inventory items throughout the game to help you survive.


Horde Mode:

In a horde mode, all you have to do is survive for as long as possible, with hordes of naked police coming at you every 15 seconds. Gear up, lock and load and survive!


Civil War Mode:

Introducing... The Civil War Mode, a game mode where you are faced to fight everyone, the police, trumpkins, antifa and karen! This mode is currently in experimental phase and will get improved in the future.


Current in-game features:

  • Iconic weapons such as Assault Rifle 15 & Glock 17 (And more!)
  • Realistic Bullet Physics System
  • Fully Interactable Inventory System
  • Consumables (Donuts & Bacon) as well as Medkits
  • Realistic AI System
  • Realistically Designed Downtown Level
  • Naked Zombie Like AI

More weapons and variety of AI will be added throughout the update of the game. Workshop is something that will be added as well.
